resources.string: Don`t miss out on Great Restaurant offers

Named one of the Top 10 authentic Italian restaurants in Britain by Antonio Carluccio in The Times Knowledge magazine, this independent restaurant offers a slice of Italy in the heart of Liverpool city centre.
If you are looking for a restaurant with a difference, then look no further than the Japanese Teppanyaki restaurant inside Liverpool s Chinatown.
Brasserie located inside the Genting Club Queen Square in the heart of the city centre on Whitechapel.
